mapper.select: select img01,ima02,img02,img03,img04,imd02,img09,img10,img23 from ${centre}.img_file left join ${centre}.imd_file on img02 = imd01 left join ${centre}.ima_file on ima01 = img01 where img01 like '%${ima01}%' or ima02 like '%${ima01}%' order by img01,img02

select ima01,IMA02,ima021,ima08,ima1010,imz02,#{centre} centre,ima25 from ${centre}.ima_file left join ${centre}.imz_file on imz01 = ima06
and ( ima01 like '%${code_1}%' or ima02 like '%${code_1}%' )
order by ima01
mapper.update:
